Detailed Description

Corresponds to a Class entry in 'pci.ids'.

Contains the Class code and name. Also holds list of Subclasses belonging to it in kid_list. And manages storing of all 'Class-Subclass-Progif's to database with it's store_db() function.

See also:
pci_ids.cc

Definition at line 54 of file pci_class_ids.hpp.

int PciIdsClass::store_db ( void   ) 

Store the Class, it's Subclasses and Prog-ifs to database.

Iterate through the Class' Subclasses and each Subclass' Prog-ifs recursively, recording or updating the database for each entry.

Returns:
Success status
  • 0 -> (SUCCESS)
  • 1 -> (FAIL)
